ComicInfo.Summary:
In a world where monsters dwell, Savage Dragon and his family fight to make the world a better place.
This Issue: Lost in Dimension-X!! The Dragon and his family are hurled into the Void and must fight for their lives against the deadly menaces found therein. Meanwhile, Dragon's allies franticly search to find them! But what the heck-Angel gets out of having to do her homework so it's not ALL bad! Plus a NEW Mighty Man feature IN ADDITION to a full length Savage Dragon feature written and inked by erratic Erik Larsen and pencilled by marvelous Mark Englert!

ComicInfo.Title: Danger in Dimension-X!; With Great Power...
ComicInfo.Writer: Chris Giarrusso,Erik Larsen,Gary Carlson,Mark Englert,Erik Larsen,Gary Carlson,Mark Englert,Chris Giarrusso
